sentences.en: ‘How’s the decorating going?’ ‘We’ve nearly finished.’
sentences.cn: “装修进行得怎么样了？”“差不多快完成了。”

sentences.en: a dramatic finish to the race
sentences.cn: 赛跑的戏剧性结局

sentences.en: Am I alone in thinking that this scandal should finish his career?
sentences.cn: 只有我认为这件丑闻会断送他的事业吗？

sentences.en: As they reached the start-finish line Prost jinked right and drew abreast.
sentences.cn: 当他们接近起止线时，普罗斯特猛向右转，两辆车并排驶过了终点。

sentences.en: Christie was easing up over the last 10m to finish third.
sentences.cn: 克里斯蒂在最后10英里慢了下来，最终获得了第3名。

sentences.en: Elliott crossed the finish line just half a second behind his adversary.
sentences.cn: 埃利奥特跨过终点线时仅比对手落后半秒钟。

sentences.en: Have you finished that book yet?
sentences.cn: 那本书你看完了吗？

sentences.en: he finished up as one of Britain's greatest architects.
sentences.cn: 他最终跻身英国最伟大的建筑师行列。

sentences.en: He shouldered his bike and walked across the finish line.
sentences.cn: 他扛着自行车走过了终点线。

sentences.en: He's probably going to finish up in jail for business fraud.
sentences.cn: 他最后很可能会因为商业诈骗而入狱。

sentences.en: Her eyes flashed, but he held up a hand. "Let me finish."
sentences.cn: 她眼光一闪，但他举起一只手说：“让我把话讲完。”

sentences.en: His exhaust fell off six laps from the finish.
sentences.cn: 离终点还有6圈时，他的排气管掉了下来。

sentences.en: His high black boots had been shined to a gleaming finish.
sentences.cn: 他那双黑色高筒靴被擦得光鉴照人。

sentences.en: I’ll just finish my coffee.
sentences.cn: 我喝完咖啡就好。

sentences.en: That table has a beautiful finish.
sentences.cn: 那张桌子的表面光洁漂亮。

sentences.en: The enamel gives new brass an authentically tarnished finish.
sentences.cn: 用瓷釉作末道漆使新的黄铜器看似自然地失去了光泽。

sentences.en: The football season finishes in May.
sentences.cn: 足球赛季在 5 月份结束。

sentences.en: The horse made a mira-culous recovery to finish a close third.
sentences.cn: 这匹马奇迹般地恢复了状态，以微弱的劣势位居第三。

sentences.en: They meant to finish her off, swiftly and without mercy.
sentences.cn: 他们打算毫不留情地迅速结果了她。

sentences.en: Watch them carefully as they finish cooking because they can burn easily.
sentences.cn: 就要做好时得小心看着，因为它们很容易烧糊。

sentences.en: We felt we might finish third. Any better would be a bonus.
sentences.cn: 我们感觉我们可能会获得第三名，要是能比这个名次更好那就是意外的惊喜了。

sentences.en: What time does school finish?
sentences.cn: 学校什么时候放学？

sentences.en: Win a trip to see the finish of the Tour de France!
sentences.cn: 赢得观看环法自行车赛最后阶段比赛之旅！

sentences.en: You can’t go anywhere until you’ve finished your homework.
sentences.cn: 没完成家庭作业前你哪儿也不能去。

words.tran_cn: 完成；结束；毁掉（finish的过去分词形式）

phrases.tran_cn: 一决雌雄（或你死我活）的争斗（或竞赛、比赛）
精密加工；高级精加工，高级光洁度
地板的刷油；楼面成就；地面终饰；地板装修
自始至终；从起点到终点
天然表面层色，天然装饰
光洁度；光面精整；光泽装饰

trans.tran_en: the end or last part of something
to complete the last part of something that you are doing
to complete the last part of something that you are doing

trans.tran_cn: 结束，完成，吃完，获得名次，使筋疲力尽
trans.tran_en: to complete the last part of something that you are doing
